items.title: Colors
items.description: Gray and brand colors for use across Bootstrap.

items.title: Scaffolding
items.description: Settings for some of the most global styles.

variables.description: Link hover color set via `darken()` function.
variables.title: link-hover-color

items.title: Media queries breakpoints
items.description: Define the breakpoints at which your layout will change, adapting to different screen sizes.

items.title: Components
items.description: Define common padding and border radius sizes and more. Values based on 14px text and 1.428 line-height (~20px to start).

variables.description: Global color for active items (e.g., navs or dropdowns).
variables.title: component-active-color

variables.description: Global background color for active items (e.g., navs or dropdowns).
variables.title: component-active-bg

variables.description: Width of the `border` for generating carets that indicator dropdowns.
variables.title: caret-width-base

variables.description: Carets increase slightly in size for larger components.
variables.title: caret-width-large

items.title: Grid system
items.description: Define the maximum width of `.container` for different screen sizes.

variables.description: Number of columns in the grid.
Padding between columns. Gets divided in half for the left and right.
variables.title: grid-gutter-width

variables.description: Point at which the navbar becomes uncollapsed.
variables.title: grid-float-breakpoint

variables.description: Point at which the navbar begins collapsing.
variables.title: grid-float-breakpoint-max

items.title: Typography
items.description: Font, line-height, and color for body text, headings, and more.

variables.description: Unit-less `line-height` for use in components like buttons.
variables.title: line-height-base

variables.description: By default, this inherits from the `<body>`.
variables.title: headings-font-family

items.title: Images
items.description: Specify custom location and filename of the included Glyphicons icon font. Useful for those including Bootstrap via Bower.

variables.description: File name for all font files.
variables.title: icon-font-name

variables.description: Element ID within SVG icon file.
variables.title: icon-font-svg-id

items.title: Buttons
items.description: For each of Bootstrap's buttons, define text, background and border color.

variables.description: Divider color for between dropdown items.
variables.title: dropdown-divider-bg

variables.description: Active dropdown menu item text color.
variables.title: dropdown-link-active-color

variables.description: Active dropdown menu item background color.
variables.title: dropdown-link-active-bg

variables.description: Disabled dropdown menu item background color.
variables.title: dropdown-link-disabled-color

variables.description: Text color for headers within dropdown menus.
variables.title: dropdown-header-color

variables.description: Border color for inputs on focus
variables.title: input-border-focus

variables.description: Background color for textual input addons
variables.title: input-group-addon-bg

variables.description: Border color for textual input addons
variables.title: input-group-addon-border-color

variables.description: Disabled cursor for form controls and buttons.
variables.title: cursor-disabled

items.title: Tables
items.description: Customizes the `.table` component with basic values, each used across all table variations.

variables.description: Default background color used for all tables.
variables.title: table-bg

variables.description: Border color for table and cell borders.
variables.title: table-border-color

items.title: Form states and alerts
items.description: Define colors for form feedback states and, by default, alerts.

variables.description: Default text color of a linked label
variables.title: label-link-hover-color

variables.description: Padding applied to the modal body
Padding applied to the modal title
variables.title: modal-title-padding

variables.description: Background color of modal content area
variables.title: modal-content-bg

items.title: Alerts
items.description: Define alert colors, border radius, and padding.

variables.description: Background color of the whole progress component
Variable for setting rounded corners on progress bar.
variables.title: progress-border-radius

variables.description: Background color of single list items on hover
variables.title: list-group-hover-bg

variables.description: Text color of active list items
variables.title: list-group-active-color

variables.description: Background color of active list items
variables.title: list-group-active-bg

variables.description: Border color of active list elements
variables.title: list-group-active-border

variables.description: Text color for content within active list items
variables.title: list-group-active-text-color

variables.description: Text color of disabled list items
variables.title: list-group-disabled-color

variables.description: Background color of disabled list items
variables.title: list-group-disabled-bg

variables.description: Text color for content within disabled list items
variables.title: list-group-disabled-text-color

variables.description: Border color for elements within panels
variables.title: panel-inner-border

variables.description: Custom text color for thumbnail captions
variables.title: thumbnail-caption-color

variables.description: Linked badge text color on hover
variables.title: badge-link-hover-color

variables.description: Badge text color in active nav link
variables.title: badge-active-color

variables.description: Badge background color in active nav link
variables.title: badge-active-bg

variables.description: Text color of current page in the breadcrumb
variables.title: breadcrumb-active-color

variables.description: Textual separator for between breadcrumb elements
variables.title: breadcrumb-separator

variables.description: Horizontal offset for forms and lists.
Width of horizontal description list titles
variables.title: dl-horizontal-offset
il-header-border-top
variables.value: @il-header-border-vertical solid transparent;//currently implemented as transparent border due to abolute positioning
